definition[0]: to tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them
example[0]: He never even stopped to congratulate me.
example[1]: She congratulated me warmly on my exam results.
example[2]: All three are to be congratulated for doing so well.
example[3]: I’d like to congratulate you on your new job
bad_example[0]: I’d like to congratulate you for your new job
explanation[1]: You congratulate someone for doing something
example[5]: She congratulated me for getting a new job
